pull.title: bitcoin-util-test.py should fail if the output file is empty
pull.body:
If the output_cmp file is empty, then `bitcoin-util-test.py` will pass the test without comparing its output to the expected output. This PR makes the test case fail if the output_cmp file is empty.

This PR also fixes the txcreate2.json file so it's no longer empty (and is therefore actually testing something!)

events.message: bitcoin-util-test.py should fail if the output file is empty

issue.title: Add bitcoin-tx JSON tests
issue.body: This PR adds new test cases to test bitcoin-tx JSON output, as suggested by @sipa in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8817 .

issue.title: bitcoin-tx JSON tests + test util improvements
issue.body:
On top of #403

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8829 - Add bitcoin-tx JSON tests
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8830 - [test] Add option to run bitcoin-util-test.py manually
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8836 - bitcoin-util-test.py should fail if the output file is empty
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8837 - allow bitcoin-tx to parse partial transactions _[partial pick]_
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8881 - Add some verbose logging to bitcoin-util-test.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9032 - test: Add format-dependent comparison to bctest
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9023 - Add logging to bitcoin-util-test.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9069 - Clean up bctest.py and bitcoin-util-test.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9945 - Improve logging in bctest.py if there is a formatting mismatch

Trivial cherry picks. Final commit updates json files to replaces legacy addresses with cashaddr.
